                    </ul>

                    <h4 class="color-text-tertiary text-normal text-mono f5 mb-2 border-lg-top pt-lg-3">Connect with others</h4>

                </details>
              </li>

      Jump to

</td>

        <td id="L96" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="96"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="186"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1704"></td>
        <td id="LC1704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a bird&#39;s-eye view of creation, as interpreted by science, which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1705"></td>
        <td id="LC1705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in language always clear and sometimes picturesque, he unfolded before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1706"></td>
        <td id="LC1706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us.  He told us of the globe, a huge mass of flaming gas, flaring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1707"></td>
        <td id="LC1707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the heavens.  Then he pictured the solidification, the cooling,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1708"></td>
        <td id="LC1708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wrinkling which formed the mountains, the steam which turned to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1709"></td>
        <td id="LC1709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water, the slow preparation of the stage upon which was to be played</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1710"></td>
        <td id="LC1710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the inexplicable drama of life.  On the origin of life itself he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1711"></td>
        <td id="LC1711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discreetly vague.  That the germs of it could hardly have survived the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1712"></td>
        <td id="LC1712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">original roasting was, he declared, fairly certain.  Therefore it had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1713"></td>
        <td id="LC1713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come later.  Had it built itself out of the cooling, inorganic elements</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1714"></td>
        <td id="LC1714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the globe?  Very likely.  Had the germs of it arrived from outside</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1715"></td>
        <td id="LC1715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon a meteor?  It was hardly conceivable.  On the whole, the wisest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1716"></td>
        <td id="LC1716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man was the least dogmatic upon the point.  We could not--or at least</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1717"></td>
        <td id="LC1717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we had not succeeded up to date in making organic life in our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1718"></td>
        <td id="LC1718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laboratories out of inorganic materials.  The gulf between the dead and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1719"></td>
        <td id="LC1719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the living was something which our chemistry could not as yet bridge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1720"></td>
        <td id="LC1720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But there was a higher and subtler chemistry of Nature, which, working</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1721"></td>
        <td id="LC1721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with great forces over long epochs, might well produce results which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1722"></td>
        <td id="LC1722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were impossible for us.  There the matter must be left.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1723"></td>
        <td id="LC1723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1724"></td>
        <td id="LC1724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This brought the lecturer to the great ladder of animal life, beginning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1725"></td>
        <td id="LC1725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">low down in molluscs and feeble sea creatures, then up rung by rung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1726"></td>
        <td id="LC1726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through reptiles and fishes, till at last we came to a kangaroo-rat, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1727"></td>
        <td id="LC1727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creature which brought forth its young alive, the direct ancestor of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1728"></td>
        <td id="LC1728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all mammals, and presumably, therefore, of everyone in the audience.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1729"></td>
        <td id="LC1729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(&quot;No, no,&quot; from a sceptical student in the back row.)  If the young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1730"></td>
        <td id="LC1730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentleman in the red tie who cried &quot;No, no,&quot; and who presumably claimed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1731"></td>
        <td id="LC1731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have been hatched out of an egg, would wait upon him after the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1732"></td>
        <td id="LC1732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lecture, he would be glad to see such a curiosity.  (Laughter.)  It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1733"></td>
        <td id="LC1733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strange to think that the climax of all the age-long process of Nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1734"></td>
        <td id="LC1734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been the creation of that gentleman in the red tie.  But had the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1735"></td>
        <td id="LC1735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">process stopped?  Was this gentleman to be taken as the final type--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1736"></td>
        <td id="LC1736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be-all and end-all of development?  He hoped that he would not hurt the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1737"></td>
        <td id="LC1737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feelings of the gentleman in the red tie if he maintained that,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1738"></td>
        <td id="LC1738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whatever virtues that gentleman might possess in private life, still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1739"></td>
        <td id="LC1739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the vast processes of the universe were not fully justified if they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1740"></td>
        <td id="LC1740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were to end entirely in his production.  Evolution was not a spent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1741"></td>
        <td id="LC1741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">force, but one still working, and even greater achievements were in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1742"></td>
        <td id="LC1742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">store.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1743"></td>
        <td id="LC1743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1744"></td>
        <td id="LC1744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Having thus, amid a general titter, played very prettily with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1745"></td>
        <td id="LC1745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interrupter, the lecturer went back to his picture of the past, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1746"></td>
        <td id="LC1746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drying of the seas, the emergence of the sand-bank, the sluggish,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1747"></td>
        <td id="LC1747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">viscous life which lay upon their margins, the overcrowded lagoons, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1748"></td>
        <td id="LC1748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tendency of the sea creatures to take refuge upon the mud-flats, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1749"></td>
        <td id="LC1749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">abundance of food awaiting them, their consequent enormous growth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1750"></td>
        <td id="LC1750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hence, ladies and gentlemen,&quot; he added, &quot;that frightful brood of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1751"></td>
        <td id="LC1751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saurians which still affright our eyes when seen in the Wealden or in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1752"></td>
        <td id="LC1752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Solenhofen slates, but which were fortunately extinct long before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1753"></td>
        <td id="LC1753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the first appearance of mankind upon this planet.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1754"></td>
        <td id="LC1754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1755"></td>
        <td id="LC1755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Question!&quot; boomed a voice from the platform.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1756"></td>
        <td id="LC1756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1757"></td>
        <td id="LC1757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Waldron was a strict disciplinarian with a gift of acid humor, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1758"></td>
        <td id="LC1758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exemplified upon the gentleman with the red tie, which made it perilous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1759"></td>
        <td id="LC1759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to interrupt him.  But this interjection appeared to him so absurd that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1760"></td>
        <td id="LC1760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was at a loss how to deal with it.  So looks the Shakespearean who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1761"></td>
        <td id="LC1761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is confronted by a rancid Baconian, or the astronomer who is assailed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1762"></td>
        <td id="LC1762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by a flat-earth fanatic.  He paused for a moment, and then, raising his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1763"></td>
        <td id="LC1763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voice, repeated slowly the words:  &quot;Which were extinct before the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1764"></td>
        <td id="LC1764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming of man.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1765"></td>
        <td id="LC1765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1766"></td>
        <td id="LC1766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Question!&quot; boomed the voice once more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1767"></td>
        <td id="LC1767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1768"></td>
        <td id="LC1768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Waldron looked with amazement along the line of professors upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1769"></td>
        <td id="LC1769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">platform until his eyes fell upon the figure of Challenger, who leaned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1770"></td>
        <td id="LC1770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back in his chair with closed eyes and an amused expression, as if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1771"></td>
        <td id="LC1771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were smiling in his sleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1772"></td>
        <td id="LC1772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1773"></td>
        <td id="LC1773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I see!&quot; said Waldron, with a shrug.  &quot;It is my friend Professor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1774"></td>
        <td id="LC1774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Challenger,&quot; and amid laughter he renewed his lecture as if this was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1775"></td>
        <td id="LC1775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">final explanation and no more need be said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1776"></td>
        <td id="LC1776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1777"></td>
        <td id="LC1777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the incident was far from being closed.  Whatever path the lecturer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1778"></td>
        <td id="LC1778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took amid the wilds of the past seemed invariably to lead him to some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1779"></td>
        <td id="LC1779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assertion as to extinct or prehistoric life which instantly brought the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1780"></td>
        <td id="LC1780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same bulls&#39; bellow from the Professor.  The audience began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1781"></td>
        <td id="LC1781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anticipate it and to roar with delight when it came.  The packed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1782"></td>
        <td id="LC1782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">benches of students joined in, and every time Challenger&#39;s beard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1783"></td>
        <td id="LC1783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opened, before any sound could come forth, there was a yell of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1784"></td>
        <td id="LC1784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Question!&quot; from a hundred voices, and an answering counter cry of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1785"></td>
        <td id="LC1785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Order!&quot; and &quot;Shame!&quot; from as many more.  Waldron, though a hardened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1786"></td>
        <td id="LC1786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lecturer and a strong man, became rattled.  He hesitated, stammered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1787"></td>
        <td id="LC1787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repeated himself, got snarled in a long sentence, and finally turned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1788"></td>
        <td id="LC1788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furiously upon the cause of his troubles.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1789"></td>
        <td id="LC1789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1790"></td>
        <td id="LC1790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;This is really intolerable!&quot; he cried, glaring across the platform.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1791"></td>
        <td id="LC1791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I must ask you, Professor Challenger, to cease these ignorant and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1792"></td>
        <td id="LC1792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unmannerly interruptions.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1793"></td>
        <td id="LC1793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1794"></td>
        <td id="LC1794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a hush over the hall, the students rigid with delight at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1795"></td>

        <td id="L1949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1949"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1972"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1973"></td>
        <td id="LC1973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Lord John Roxton&#39;s reputation as a sportsman and a traveler is, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1974"></td>
        <td id="LC1974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course, world-famous,&quot; said the chairman; &quot;at the same time it would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1975"></td>
        <td id="LC1975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainly be as well to have a member of the Press upon such an</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1976"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1977"></td>
        <td id="LC1977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2250"></td>
        <td id="LC2250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be my comrade for many a day, and so I have tried to set him down as I</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2251"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2256"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2261"></td>

        <td id="L2289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2289"></td>
        <td id="LC2289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. McArdle.  Let me draw one last picture before I close the</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2306"></td>

        <td id="LC2310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a matter of perfect indifference to me, and I refuse to entertain</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2325"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2333"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2336"></td>
        <td id="LC2336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There&#39;s the last bell for letters, and it&#39;s good-bye to the pilot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2337"></td>
        <td id="LC2337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We&#39;ll be &quot;down, hull-down, on the old trail&quot; from now on.  God bless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2338"></td>
        <td id="LC2338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all we leave behind us, and send us safely back.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2339"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2340"></td>
        <td id="LC2340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2341"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2343"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2431"></td>
        <td id="LC2431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2432"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2523"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2610"></td>
        <td id="LC2610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lord John Roxton has chartered a large steam launch, the Esmeralda,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2611"></td>
        <td id="LC2611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was to carry us up the river.  So far as climate goes, it was</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immaterial what time we chose for our expedition, as the temperature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2613"></td>
        <td id="LC2613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ranges from seventy-five to ninety degrees both summer and winter, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2614"></td>
        <td id="LC2614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no appreciable difference in heat.  In moisture, however, it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2615"></td>
        <td id="LC2615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">otherwise; from December to May is the period of the rains, and during</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2616"></td>
        <td id="LC2616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this time the river slowly rises until it attains a height of nearly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2617"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2618"></td>
        <td id="LC2618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great lagoons over a monstrous waste of country, and forms a huge</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">district, called locally the Gapo, which is for the most part too</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2620"></td>

        <td id="L2621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2621"></td>

        <td id="L2622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2622"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2625"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2798"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2886"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2887"></td>
        <td id="LC2887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was in the early forenoon of the next day that we made the great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2888"></td>
        <td id="LC2888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">departure.  Since dawn Professor Challenger had been acutely uneasy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2889"></td>
        <td id="LC2889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continually scanning each bank of the river.  Suddenly he gave an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2890"></td>
        <td id="LC2890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exclamation of satisfaction and pointed to a single tree, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2891"></td>
        <td id="LC2891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">projected at a peculiar angle over the side of the stream.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2892"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2893"></td>
        <td id="LC2893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What do you make of that?&quot; he asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2894"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2895"></td>
        <td id="LC2895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It is surely an Assai palm,&quot; said Summerlee.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2896"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2897"></td>
        <td id="LC2897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Exactly.  It was an Assai palm which I took for my landmark.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2898"></td>
        <td id="LC2898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secret opening is half a mile onwards upon the other side of the river.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2899"></td>
        <td id="LC2899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is no break in the trees.  That is the wonder and the mystery of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2900"></td>
        <td id="LC2900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.  There where you see light-green rushes instead of dark-green</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2901"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2903"></td>
        <td id="LC2903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2904"></td>
        <td id="LC2904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was indeed a wonderful place.  Having reached the spot marked by a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2905"></td>
        <td id="LC2905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">line of light-green rushes, we poled out two canoes through them for</td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2923"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2924"></td>
        <td id="LC2924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animal life was more frequent, and the tameness of the creatures showed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2925"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2928"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2929"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brushwood, and its green, baleful eyes glared hatred at us over its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2932"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2933"></td>
        <td id="LC2933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stork, heron, and ibis gathering in little groups, blue, scarlet, and</td>

        <td id="LC2934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">white, upon every log which jutted from the bank, while beneath us the</td>

        <td id="L2935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2935"></td>
        <td id="LC2935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crystal water was alive with fish of every shape and color.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2937"></td>
        <td id="LC2937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For three days we made our way up this tunnel of hazy green sunshine.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2938"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2943"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2944"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2948"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2951"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC2952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">river.  In the morning Lord John and I made our way for a couple of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2953"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC2961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our journey.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2962"></td>
        <td id="LC2962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2963"></td>
        <td id="LC2963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">An unfortunate quarrel between our pepper-pots marked the outset of our</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2965"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2966"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2967"></td>
        <td id="LC2967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(it was only the carrying of an aneroid barometer), the matter suddenly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2968"></td>
        <td id="LC2968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came to a head.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2969"></td>
        <td id="LC2969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2970"></td>
        <td id="LC2970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;May I ask, sir,&quot; said Summerlee, with vicious calm, &quot;in what capacity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2971"></td>
        <td id="LC2971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you take it upon yourself to issue these orders?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2972"></td>
        <td id="LC2972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2973"></td>
        <td id="LC2973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Challenger glared and bristled.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2974"></td>
        <td id="LC2974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2975"></td>
        <td id="LC2975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I do it, Professor Summerlee, as leader of this expedition.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2976"></td>
        <td id="LC2976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2977"></td>
        <td id="LC2977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am compelled to tell you, sir, that I do not recognize you in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2978"></td>
        <td id="LC2978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">capacity.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2979"></td>
        <td id="LC2979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2980"></td>
        <td id="LC2980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Indeed!&quot; Challenger bowed with unwieldy sarcasm.  &quot;Perhaps you would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2981"></td>
        <td id="LC2981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">define my exact position.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2982"></td>
        <td id="LC2982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2983"></td>
        <td id="LC2983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, sir.  You are a man whose veracity is upon trial, and this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2984"></td>
        <td id="LC2984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">committee is here to try it.  You walk, sir, with your judges.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2985"></td>
        <td id="LC2985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2986"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2987"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2991"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3070"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3071"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3072"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3073"></td>
        <td id="LC3073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did so we saw, at the distance of a mile or so, something which</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="L3724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3724"></td>

        <td id="L3812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3812"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3814"></td>
        <td id="LC3814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was quiet, save that a strange, many-colored bird flew up from under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3815"></td>
        <td id="LC3815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his feet and vanished among the trees.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3816"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3817"></td>
        <td id="LC3817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Summerlee was the second.  His wiry energy is wonderful in so frail a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3818"></td>
        <td id="LC3818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frame.  He insisted upon having two rifles slung upon his back, so that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3819"></td>
        <td id="LC3819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both Professors were armed when he had made his transit.  I came next,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3820"></td>
        <td id="LC3820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and tried hard not to look down into the horrible gulf over which I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3821"></td>
        <td id="LC3821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passing.  Summerlee held out the butt-end of his rifle, and an instant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3822"></td>
        <td id="LC3822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">later I was able to grasp his hand.  As to Lord John, he walked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3823"></td>
        <td id="LC3823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">across--actually walked without support!  He must have nerves of iron.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3824"></td>
        <td id="LC3824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3825"></td>
        <td id="LC3825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And there we were, the four of us, upon the dreamland, the lost world,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3826"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disaster?  Let me say in a few words how the crushing blow fell upon us.</td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3830"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind us.  With one impulse we rushed back the way that we had come.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3833"></td>

        <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3900"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3901"></td>
        <td id="LC3901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A man in white clothes, who could only be the surviving half-breed, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3902"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3903"></td>

        <td id="L3904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3904"></td>

        <td id="L3905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3905"></td>
        <td id="LC3905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fugitive and flung his arms round his neck.  They rolled on the ground</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3906"></td>
        <td id="LC3906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together.  An instant afterwards Zambo rose, looked at the prostrate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3907"></td>
        <td id="LC3907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man, and then, waving his hand joyously to us, came running in our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3908"></td>
        <td id="LC3908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">direction.  The white figure lay motionless in the middle of the great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3909"></td>
        <td id="LC3909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3910"></td>
        <td id="LC3910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3911"></td>
        <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Our two traitors had been destroyed, but the mischief that they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done lived after them.  By no possible means could we get back to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pinnacle.  We had been natives of the world; now we were natives of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plateau.  The two things were separate and apart.  There was the plain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which led to the canoes.  Yonder, beyond the violet, hazy horizon, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>
        <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the stream which led back to civilization.  But the link between was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>
        <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">missing.  No human ingenuity could suggest a means of bridging the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3918"></td>
        <td id="LC3918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chasm which yawned between ourselves and our past lives.  One instant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>
        <td id="LC3919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had altered the whole conditions of our existence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>
        <td id="LC3920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3921"></td>
        <td id="LC3921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was at such a moment that I learned the stuff of which my three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3922"></td>
        <td id="LC3922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comrades were composed.  They were grave, it is true, and thoughtful,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3923"></td>
        <td id="LC3923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but of an invincible serenity.  For the moment we could only sit among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3924"></td>
        <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bushes in patience and wait the coming of Zambo.  Presently his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3925"></td>
        <td id="LC3925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honest black face topped the rocks and his Herculean figure emerged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3926"></td>
        <td id="LC3926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the top of the pinnacle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3927"></td>
        <td id="LC3927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3928"></td>
        <td id="LC3928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What I do now?&quot; he cried.  &quot;You tell me and I do it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3929"></td>
        <td id="LC3929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3930"></td>
        <td id="LC3930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a question which it was easier to ask than to answer.  One thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3931"></td>
        <td id="LC3931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only was clear.  He was our one trusty link with the outside world.  On</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3932"></td>
        <td id="LC3932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no account must he leave us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3933"></td>
        <td id="LC3933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3934"></td>
        <td id="LC3934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No no!&quot; he cried.  &quot;I not leave you.  Whatever come, you always find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3935"></td>
        <td id="LC3935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me here.  But no able to keep Indians.  Already they say too much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3936"></td>
        <td id="LC3936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Curupuri live on this place, and they go home.  Now you leave them me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3937"></td>
        <td id="LC3937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no able to keep them.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3938"></td>
        <td id="LC3938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3939"></td>
        <td id="LC3939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a fact that our Indians had shown in many ways of late that they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3940"></td>
        <td id="LC3940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were weary of their journey and anxious to return.  We realized that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3941"></td>
        <td id="LC3941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Zambo spoke the truth, and that it would be impossible for him to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3942"></td>
        <td id="LC3942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3943"></td>
        <td id="LC3943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3944"></td>
        <td id="LC3944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Make them wait till to-morrow, Zambo,&quot; I shouted; &quot;then I can send</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3945"></td>
        <td id="LC3945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter back by them.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3946"></td>
        <td id="LC3946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3947"></td>
        <td id="LC3947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Very good, sarr! I promise they wait till to-morrow,&quot; said the negro.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>
        <td id="LC3948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But what I do for you now?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3949"></td>
        <td id="LC3949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3950"></td>
        <td id="LC3950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was plenty for him to do, and admirably the faithful fellow did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3951"></td>
        <td id="LC3951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.  First of all, under our directions, he undid the rope from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3952"></td>
        <td id="LC3952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tree-stump and threw one end of it across to us.  It was not thicker</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3953"></td>
        <td id="LC3953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than a clothes-line, but it was of great strength, and though we could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3954"></td>
        <td id="LC3954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not make a bridge of it, we might well find it invaluable if we had any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3955"></td>
        <td id="LC3955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">climbing to do.  He then fastened his end of the rope to the package of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3956"></td>
        <td id="LC3956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supplies which had been carried up, and we were able to drag it across.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3957"></td>
        <td id="LC3957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This gave us the means of life for at least a week, even if we found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3958"></td>
        <td id="LC3958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing else.  Finally he descended and carried up two other packets of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3959"></td>
        <td id="LC3959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mixed goods--a box of ammunition and a number of other things, all of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3960"></td>
        <td id="LC3960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which we got across by throwing our rope to him and hauling it back.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3961"></td>
        <td id="LC3961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was evening when he at last climbed down, with a final assurance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3962"></td>
        <td id="LC3962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he would keep the Indians till next morning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3963"></td>
        <td id="LC3963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3964"></td>
        <td id="LC3964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so it is that I have spent nearly the whole of this our first night</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3965"></td>
        <td id="LC3965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the plateau writing up our experiences by the light of a single</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3966"></td>
        <td id="LC3966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">candle-lantern.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3967"></td>
        <td id="LC3967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3968"></td>
        <td id="LC3968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We supped and camped at the very edge of the cliff, quenching our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3969"></td>
        <td id="LC3969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thirst with two bottles of Apollinaris which were in one of the cases.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3970"></td>
        <td id="LC3970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is vital to us to find water, but I think even Lord John himself had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3971"></td>
        <td id="LC3971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had adventures enough for one day, and none of us felt inclined to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3972"></td>
        <td id="LC3972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the first push into the unknown.  We forbore to light a fire or to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3973"></td>
        <td id="LC3973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any unnecessary sound.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3974"></td>
        <td id="LC3974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3975"></td>
        <td id="LC3975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To-morrow (or to-day, rather, for it is already dawn as I write) we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3976"></td>
        <td id="LC3976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall make our first venture into this strange land.  When I shall be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3977"></td>
        <td id="LC3977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to write again--or if I ever shall write again--I know not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3978"></td>
        <td id="LC3978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Meanwhile, I can see that the Indians are still in their place, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3979"></td>
        <td id="LC3979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am sure that the faithful Zambo will be here presently to get my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3980"></td>
        <td id="LC3980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter.  I only trust that it will come to hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3981"></td>
        <td id="LC3981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3982"></td>
        <td id="LC3982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3983"></td>
        <td id="LC3983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">P.S.--The more I think the more desperate does our position seem.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3984"></td>
        <td id="LC3984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see no possible hope of our return.  If there were a high tree near the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3985"></td>
        <td id="LC3985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">edge of the plateau we might drop a return bridge across, but there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3986"></td>
        <td id="LC3986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">none within fifty yards.  Our united strength could not carry a trunk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3987"></td>
        <td id="LC3987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which would serve our purpose.  The rope, of course, is far too short</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3988"></td>
        <td id="LC3988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we could descend by it.  No, our position is hopeless--hopeless!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3989"></td>
        <td id="LC3989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3990"></td>
        <td id="LC3990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The most wonderful things have happened and are continually happening</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3991"></td>
        <td id="LC3991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to us.  All the paper that I possess consists of five old note-books</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3992"></td>
        <td id="LC3992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a lot of scraps, and I have only the one stylographic pencil; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3993"></td>
        <td id="LC3993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so long as I can move my hand I will continue to set down our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3994"></td>
        <td id="LC3994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experiences and impressions, for, since we are the only men of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3995"></td>
        <td id="LC3995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whole human race to see such things, it is of enormous importance that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3996"></td>
        <td id="LC3996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should record them whilst they are fresh in my memory and before that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3997"></td>
        <td id="LC3997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fate which seems to be constantly impending does actually overtake us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3998"></td>
        <td id="LC3998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whether Zambo can at last take these letters to the river, or whether I</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4087"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4090"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4183"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4275"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4637"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4638"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4641"></td>
        <td id="LC4641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4735"></td>
        <td id="LC4735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4736"></td>
        <td id="LC4736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Perhaps Professor Summerlee may have an observation to make,&quot; he said,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4737"></td>
        <td id="LC4737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the two savants ascended together into some rarefied scientific</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4738"></td>
        <td id="LC4738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">atmosphere, where the possibilities of a modification of the birth-rate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4739"></td>
        <td id="LC4739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were weighed against the decline of the food supply as a check in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4740"></td>
        <td id="LC4740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggle for existence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4741"></td>
        <td id="LC4741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4742"></td>
        <td id="LC4742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That morning we mapped out a small portion of the plateau, avoiding the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4743"></td>
        <td id="LC4743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swamp of the pterodactyls, and keeping to the east of our brook instead</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4744"></td>
        <td id="LC4744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of to the west.  In that direction the country was still thickly</td>

        <td id="LC4745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wooded, with so much undergrowth that our progress was very slow.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4746"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4747"></td>
        <td id="LC4747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have dwelt up to now upon the terrors of Maple White Land; but there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4748"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4749"></td>
        <td id="LC4749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lovely flowers--mostly, as I observed, white or yellow in color, these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC4750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being, as our professors explained, the primitive flower-shades.  In</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4825"></td>
        <td id="LC4825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Our young friend makes up for many obvious mental lacunae by some</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4826"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5086"></td>
        <td id="LC5086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Challenger looked at me sympathetically, and shook his great head in</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5092"></td>
        <td id="LC5092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have said--or perhaps I have not said, for my memory plays me sad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5093"></td>
        <td id="LC5093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tricks these days--that I glowed with pride when three such men as my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5094"></td>
        <td id="LC5094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comrades thanked me for having saved, or at least greatly helped, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5095"></td>
        <td id="LC5095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">situation.  As the youngster of the party, not merely in years, but in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5096"></td>
        <td id="LC5096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experience, character, knowledge, and all that goes to make a man, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5097"></td>
        <td id="LC5097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been overshadowed from the first.  And now I was coming into my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5098"></td>
        <td id="LC5098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own.  I warmed at the thought.  Alas! for the pride which goes before a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5099"></td>
        <td id="LC5099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fall!  That little glow of self-satisfaction, that added measure of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5100"></td>
        <td id="LC5100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-confidence, were to lead me on that very night to the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5101"></td>
        <td id="LC5101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreadful experience of my life, ending with a shock which turns my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5102"></td>
        <td id="LC5102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart sick when I think of it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5103"></td>
        <td id="LC5103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5104"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5197"></td>

      </tr>
