      <tr>
        <td id="L5466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5466"></td>
        <td id="LC5466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5467"></td>
        <td id="LC5467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And suddenly there came something to remind me of my absent companions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5468"></td>
        <td id="LC5468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the clear, still morning air there sounded far away the sharp, hard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5469"></td>
        <td id="LC5469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">note of a single rifle-shot.  I paused and listened, but there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5470"></td>
        <td id="LC5470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing more.  For a moment I was shocked at the thought that some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5471"></td>
        <td id="LC5471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sudden danger might have befallen them.  But then a simpler and more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5472"></td>
        <td id="LC5472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">natural explanation came to my mind.  It was now broad daylight.  No</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5473"></td>
        <td id="LC5473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubt my absence had been noticed.  They had imagined, that I was lost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5474"></td>
        <td id="LC5474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the woods, and had fired this shot to guide me home.  It is true</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5475"></td>
        <td id="LC5475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we had made a strict resolution against firing, but if it seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5476"></td>
        <td id="LC5476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to them that I might be in danger they would not hesitate.  It was for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5477"></td>
        <td id="LC5477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me now to hurry on as fast as possible, and so to reassure them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5478"></td>
        <td id="LC5478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5479"></td>
        <td id="LC5479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was weary and spent, so my progress was not so fast as I wished; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5480"></td>
        <td id="LC5480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at last I came into regions which I knew.  There was the swamp of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5481"></td>
        <td id="LC5481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pterodactyls upon my left; there in front of me was the glade of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5482"></td>
        <td id="LC5482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">iguanodons.  Now I was in the last belt of trees which separated me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5483"></td>
        <td id="LC5483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from Fort Challenger.  I raised my voice in a cheery shout to allay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5484"></td>
        <td id="LC5484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their fears.  No answering greeting came back to me.  My heart sank at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5485"></td>
        <td id="LC5485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that ominous stillness.  I quickened my pace into a run.  The zareba</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5486"></td>
        <td id="LC5486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rose before me, even as I had left it, but the gate was open.  I rushed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5487"></td>
        <td id="LC5487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in.  In the cold, morning light it was a fearful sight which met my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5488"></td>
        <td id="LC5488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes.  Our effects were scattered in wild confusion over the ground; my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5489"></td>
        <td id="LC5489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comrades had disappeared, and close to the smouldering ashes of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5490"></td>
        <td id="LC5490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fire the grass was stained crimson with a hideous pool of blood.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5491"></td>
        <td id="LC5491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5492"></td>
        <td id="LC5492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was so stunned by this sudden shock that for a time I must have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5493"></td>
        <td id="LC5493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nearly lost my reason.  I have a vague recollection, as one remembers a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5494"></td>
        <td id="LC5494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bad dream, of rushing about through the woods all round the empty camp,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5495"></td>
        <td id="LC5495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">calling wildly for my companions.  No answer came back from the silent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5496"></td>
        <td id="LC5496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shadows.  The horrible thought that I might never see them again, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5497"></td>
        <td id="LC5497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I might find myself abandoned all alone in that dreadful place, with no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5498"></td>
        <td id="LC5498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possible way of descending into the world below, that I might live and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5499"></td>
        <td id="LC5499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">die in that nightmare country, drove me to desperation.  I could have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5500"></td>
        <td id="LC5500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">torn my hair and beaten my head in my despair.  Only now did I realize</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5501"></td>
        <td id="LC5501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how I had learned to lean upon my companions, upon the serene</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5502"></td>
        <td id="LC5502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-confidence of Challenger, and upon the masterful, humorous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5503"></td>
        <td id="LC5503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coolness of Lord John Roxton.  Without them I was like a child in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5504"></td>
        <td id="LC5504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark, helpless and powerless.  I did not know which way to turn or what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5505"></td>
        <td id="LC5505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should do first.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5506"></td>
        <td id="LC5506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5507"></td>
        <td id="LC5507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a period, during which I sat in bewilderment, I set myself to try</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5508"></td>
        <td id="LC5508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and discover what sudden misfortune could have befallen my companions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5509"></td>
        <td id="LC5509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The whole disordered appearance of the camp showed that there had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5510"></td>
        <td id="LC5510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some sort of attack, and the rifle-shot no doubt marked the time when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5511"></td>
        <td id="LC5511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it had occurred.  That there should have been only one shot showed that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5512"></td>
        <td id="LC5512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it had been all over in an instant.  The rifles still lay upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5513"></td>
        <td id="LC5513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ground, and one of them--Lord John&#39;s--had the empty cartridge in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5514"></td>
        <td id="LC5514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breech.  The blankets of Challenger and of Summerlee beside the fire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5515"></td>
        <td id="LC5515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suggested that they had been asleep at the time.  The cases of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5516"></td>
        <td id="LC5516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ammunition and of food were scattered about in a wild litter, together</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5517"></td>
        <td id="LC5517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with our unfortunate cameras and plate-carriers, but none of them were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5518"></td>
        <td id="LC5518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">missing.  On the other hand, all the exposed provisions--and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5519"></td>
        <td id="LC5519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remembered that there were a considerable quantity of them--were gone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5520"></td>
        <td id="LC5520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They were animals, then, and not natives, who had made the inroad, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5521"></td>
        <td id="LC5521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surely the latter would have left nothing behind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5522"></td>
        <td id="LC5522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5523"></td>
        <td id="LC5523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But if animals, or some single terrible animal, then what had become of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5524"></td>
        <td id="LC5524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my comrades?  A ferocious beast would surely have destroyed them and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5525"></td>
        <td id="LC5525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left their remains.  It is true that there was that one hideous pool of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5526"></td>
        <td id="LC5526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blood, which told of violence.  Such a monster as had pursued me during</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5527"></td>
        <td id="LC5527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the night could have carried away a victim as easily as a cat would a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5528"></td>
        <td id="LC5528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mouse.  In that case the others would have followed in pursuit.  But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5529"></td>
        <td id="LC5529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then they would assuredly have taken their rifles with them.  The more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5530"></td>
        <td id="LC5530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I tried to think it out with my confused and weary brain the less could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5531"></td>
        <td id="LC5531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I find any plausible explanation.  I searched round in the forest, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5532"></td>
        <td id="LC5532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could see no tracks which could help me to a conclusion.  Once I lost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5533"></td>
        <td id="LC5533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself, and it was only by good luck, and after an hour of wandering,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5534"></td>
        <td id="LC5534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I found the camp once more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5535"></td>
        <td id="LC5535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5536"></td>
        <td id="LC5536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suddenly a thought came to me and brought some little comfort to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5537"></td>
        <td id="LC5537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart.  I was not absolutely alone in the world.  Down at the bottom of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5538"></td>
        <td id="LC5538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the cliff, and within call of me, was waiting the faithful Zambo.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5539"></td>
        <td id="LC5539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went to the edge of the plateau and looked over.  Sure enough, he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5540"></td>
        <td id="LC5540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">squatting among his blankets beside his fire in his little camp.  But,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5541"></td>
        <td id="LC5541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to my amazement, a second man was seated in front of him.  For an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5542"></td>
        <td id="LC5542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instant my heart leaped for joy, as I thought that one of my comrades</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5543"></td>
        <td id="LC5543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had made his way safely down.  But a second glance dispelled the hope.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5544"></td>
        <td id="LC5544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The rising sun shone red upon the man&#39;s skin.  He was an Indian.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5545"></td>
        <td id="LC5545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shouted loudly and waved my handkerchief.  Presently Zambo looked up,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5546"></td>
        <td id="LC5546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waved his hand, and turned to ascend the pinnacle.  In a short time he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5547"></td>
        <td id="LC5547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was standing close to me and listening with deep distress to the story</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5548"></td>
        <td id="LC5548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I told him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5549"></td>
        <td id="LC5549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5550"></td>
        <td id="LC5550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Devil got them for sure, Massa Malone,&quot; said he.  &quot;You got into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5551"></td>
        <td id="LC5551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">devil&#39;s country, sah, and he take you all to himself.  You take advice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5552"></td>
        <td id="LC5552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Massa Malone, and come down quick, else he get you as well.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5553"></td>
        <td id="LC5553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5554"></td>
        <td id="LC5554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How can I come down, Zambo?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5555"></td>
        <td id="LC5555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5556"></td>
        <td id="LC5556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You get creepers from trees, Massa Malone.  Throw them over here.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5557"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5573"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5574"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5642"></td>

        <td id="L5648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5648"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5825"></td>
        <td id="LC5825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would touch Challenger, but I wouldn&#39;t answer for Summerlee.  But they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5826"></td>
        <td id="LC5826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would have had him in any case.  Of that I am certain.  So I haven&#39;t</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6101"></td>
        <td id="LC6101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You keep a diary of these events, and you expect eventually to publish</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6106"></td>

        <td id="L6146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6146"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6163"></td>
        <td id="LC6163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We were able now to take a more leisurely view of the Indians whom we</td>

</td>

        <td id="L6177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6177"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6181"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6183"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6189"></td>
        <td id="LC6189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seized the nearest Indian by the shoulder and proceeded to lecture upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6190"></td>
        <td id="LC6190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him as if he were a potted specimen in a class-room.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6191"></td>
        <td id="LC6191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6192"></td>
        <td id="LC6192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The type of these people,&quot; said he in his sonorous fashion, &quot;whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6193"></td>
        <td id="LC6193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judged by cranial capacity, facial angle, or any other test, cannot be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6194"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6285"></td>

        <td id="L6286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6286"></td>

        <td id="LC6375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the young chief.  Finally one of them, an elderly man, with a</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6557"></td>
        <td id="LC6557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ape-men in the trees above us hurled down stones and logs of wood,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6558"></td>
        <td id="LC6558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occasionally dropping bodily on to our ranks and fighting furiously</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6559"></td>
        <td id="LC6559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">until they were felled.  Once our allies broke under the pressure, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6560"></td>
        <td id="LC6560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had it not been for the execution done by our rifles they would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6561"></td>
        <td id="LC6561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainly have taken to their heels.  But they were gallantly rallied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6562"></td>
        <td id="LC6562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by their old chief and came on with such a rush that the ape-men began</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6563"></td>
        <td id="LC6563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in turn to give way.  Summerlee was weaponless, but I was emptying my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6564"></td>
        <td id="LC6564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">magazine as quick as I could fire, and on the further flank we heard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6565"></td>
        <td id="LC6565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the continuous cracking of our companion&#39;s rifles.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6566"></td>
        <td id="LC6566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6567"></td>
        <td id="LC6567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then in a moment came the panic and the collapse.  Screaming and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6568"></td>
        <td id="LC6568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">howling, the great creatures rushed away in all directions through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6569"></td>
        <td id="LC6569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brushwood, while our allies yelled in their savage delight, following</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6570"></td>
        <td id="LC6570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swiftly after their flying enemies.  All the feuds of countless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6571"></td>
        <td id="LC6571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">generations, all the hatreds and cruelties of their narrow history, all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6572"></td>
        <td id="LC6572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the memories of ill-usage and persecution were to be purged that day.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6573"></td>
        <td id="LC6573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At last man was to be supreme and the man-beast to find forever his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6574"></td>
        <td id="LC6574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allotted place.  Fly as they would the fugitives were too slow to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6575"></td>
        <td id="LC6575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escape from the active savages, and from every side in the tangled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6576"></td>
        <td id="LC6576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woods we heard the exultant yells, the twanging of bows, and the crash</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6577"></td>
        <td id="LC6577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and thud as ape-men were brought down from their hiding-places in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6578"></td>
        <td id="LC6578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trees.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6579"></td>
        <td id="LC6579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6580"></td>
        <td id="LC6580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was following the others, when I found that Lord John and Challenger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6581"></td>
        <td id="LC6581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had come across to join us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6582"></td>
        <td id="LC6582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6583"></td>
        <td id="LC6583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s over,&quot; said Lord John.  &quot;I think we can leave the tidying up to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6584"></td>
        <td id="LC6584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them.  Perhaps the less we see of it the better we shall sleep.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6585"></td>
        <td id="LC6585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6586"></td>
        <td id="LC6586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Challenger&#39;s eyes were shining with the lust of slaughter.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6587"></td>
        <td id="LC6587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6588"></td>
        <td id="LC6588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We have been privileged,&quot; he cried, strutting about like a gamecock,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6589"></td>
        <td id="LC6589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;to be present at one of the typical decisive battles of history--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6590"></td>
        <td id="LC6590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">battles which have determined the fate of the world.  What, my friends,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6591"></td>
        <td id="LC6591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the conquest of one nation by another?  It is meaningless.  Each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6592"></td>
        <td id="LC6592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">produces the same result.  But those fierce fights, when in the dawn of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6593"></td>
        <td id="LC6593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ages the cave-dwellers held their own against the tiger folk, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6594"></td>
        <td id="LC6594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the elephants first found that they had a master, those were the real</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6595"></td>
        <td id="LC6595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conquests--the victories that count.  By this strange turn of fate we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6596"></td>
        <td id="LC6596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have seen and helped to decide even such a contest.  Now upon this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6597"></td>
        <td id="LC6597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plateau the future must ever be for man.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6598"></td>
        <td id="LC6598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6599"></td>
        <td id="LC6599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It needed a robust faith in the end to justify such tragic means.  As</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6600"></td>
        <td id="LC6600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we advanced together through the woods we found the ape-men lying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6601"></td>
        <td id="LC6601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thick, transfixed with spears or arrows.  Here and there a little group</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6602"></td>
        <td id="LC6602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of shattered Indians marked where one of the anthropoids had turned to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6603"></td>
        <td id="LC6603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bay, and sold his life dearly.  Always in front of us we heard the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6604"></td>
        <td id="LC6604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yelling and roaring which showed the direction of the pursuit.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6605"></td>
        <td id="LC6605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ape-men had been driven back to their city, they had made a last stand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6606"></td>
        <td id="LC6606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there, once again they had been broken, and now we were in time to see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6607"></td>
        <td id="LC6607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the final fearful scene of all.  Some eighty or a hundred males, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6608"></td>
        <td id="LC6608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last survivors, had been driven across that same little clearing which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6609"></td>
        <td id="LC6609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">led to the edge of the cliff, the scene of our own exploit two days</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6610"></td>
        <td id="LC6610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before.  As we arrived the Indians, a semicircle of spearmen, had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6611"></td>
        <td id="LC6611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closed in on them, and in a minute it was over, Thirty or forty died</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6612"></td>
        <td id="LC6612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where they stood.  The others, screaming and clawing, were thrust over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6613"></td>
        <td id="LC6613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the precipice, and went hurtling down, as their prisoners had of old,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6614"></td>
        <td id="LC6614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on to the sharp bamboos six hundred feet below.  It was as Challenger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6615"></td>
        <td id="LC6615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had said, and the reign of man was assured forever in Maple White Land.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6616"></td>
        <td id="LC6616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The males were exterminated, Ape Town was destroyed, the females and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6617"></td>
        <td id="LC6617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young were driven away to live in bondage, and the long rivalry of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6618"></td>
        <td id="LC6618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">untold centuries had reached its bloody end.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6619"></td>
        <td id="LC6619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6620"></td>
        <td id="LC6620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For us the victory brought much advantage.  Once again we were able to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6621"></td>
        <td id="LC6621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">visit our camp and get at our stores.  Once more also we were able to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6622"></td>
        <td id="LC6622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">communicate with Zambo, who had been terrified by the spectacle from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6623"></td>
        <td id="LC6623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afar of an avalanche of apes falling from the edge of the cliff.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6624"></td>
        <td id="LC6624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6625"></td>
        <td id="LC6625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Come away, Massas, come away!&quot; he cried, his eyes starting from his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6626"></td>
        <td id="LC6626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head.  &quot;The debbil get you sure if you stay up there.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6627"></td>
        <td id="LC6627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6628"></td>
        <td id="LC6628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It is the voice of sanity!&quot; said Summerlee with conviction.  &quot;We have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6629"></td>
        <td id="LC6629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had adventures enough and they are neither suitable to our character or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6630"></td>
        <td id="LC6630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our position.  I hold you to your word, Challenger.  From now  onwards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6631"></td>
        <td id="LC6631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you devote your energies to getting us out of this horrible country and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6632"></td>
        <td id="LC6632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back once more to civilization.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6633"></td>
        <td id="LC6633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6634"></td>
        <td id="LC6634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6635"></td>
        <td id="LC6635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6636"></td>
        <td id="LC6636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I write this from day to day, but I trust that before I come to the end</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6637"></td>
        <td id="LC6637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it, I may be able to say that the light shines, at last, through our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6638"></td>
        <td id="LC6638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clouds.  We are held here with no clear means of making our escape, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6639"></td>
        <td id="LC6639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bitterly we chafe against it. Yet, I can well imagine that the day may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6640"></td>
        <td id="LC6640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come when we may be glad that we were kept, against our will, to see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6641"></td>
        <td id="LC6641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something more of the wonders of this singular place, and of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6642"></td>
        <td id="LC6642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creatures who inhabit it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6643"></td>
        <td id="LC6643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6644"></td>
        <td id="LC6644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The victory of the Indians and the annihilation of the ape-men, marked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6645"></td>
        <td id="LC6645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the turning point of our fortunes.  From then onwards, we were in truth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6646"></td>
        <td id="LC6646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">masters of the plateau, for the natives looked upon us with a mixture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6647"></td>
        <td id="LC6647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of fear and gratitude, since by our strange powers we had aided them to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6648"></td>
        <td id="LC6648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destroy their hereditary foe.  For their own sakes they would, perhaps,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6649"></td>
        <td id="LC6649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be glad to see the departure of such formidable and incalculable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6650"></td>
        <td id="LC6650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people, but they have not themselves suggested any way by which we may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6651"></td>
        <td id="LC6651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reach the plains below.  There had been, so far as we could follow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6652"></td>
        <td id="LC6652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their signs, a tunnel by which the place could be approached, the lower</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6653"></td>
        <td id="LC6653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exit of which we had seen from below.  By this, no doubt, both ape-men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6654"></td>
        <td id="LC6654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Indians had at different epochs reached the top, and Maple White</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6655"></td>
        <td id="LC6655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his companion had taken the same way.  Only the year before,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6656"></td>
        <td id="LC6656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, there had been a terrific earthquake, and the upper end of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6657"></td>
        <td id="LC6657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tunnel had fallen in and completely disappeared.  The Indians now could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6658"></td>
        <td id="LC6658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only shake their heads and shrug their shoulders when we expressed by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6659"></td>
        <td id="LC6659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">signs our desire to descend.  It may be that they cannot, but it may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6660"></td>
        <td id="LC6660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also be that they will not, help us to get away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6661"></td>
        <td id="LC6661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6662"></td>
        <td id="LC6662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At the end of the victorious campaign the surviving ape-folk were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6663"></td>
        <td id="LC6663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">driven across the plateau (their wailings were horrible) and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6664"></td>
        <td id="LC6664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">established in the neighborhood of the Indian caves, where they would,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6665"></td>
        <td id="LC6665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from now onwards, be a servile race under the eyes of their masters.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6666"></td>
        <td id="LC6666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a rude, raw, primeval version of the Jews in Babylon or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6667"></td>
        <td id="LC6667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Israelites in Egypt.  At night we could hear from amid the trees the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6668"></td>
        <td id="LC6668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long-drawn cry, as some primitive Ezekiel mourned for fallen greatness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6669"></td>
        <td id="LC6669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and recalled the departed glories of Ape Town.  Hewers of wood and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6670"></td>
        <td id="LC6670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drawers of water, such were they from now onwards.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6671"></td>
        <td id="LC6671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6672"></td>
        <td id="LC6672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had returned across the plateau with our allies two days after the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6673"></td>
        <td id="LC6673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">battle, and made our camp at the foot of their cliffs.  They would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6674"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6675"></td>
        <td id="LC6675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consent to it considering that to do so would put us in their power if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6676"></td>
        <td id="LC6676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were treacherously disposed.  We kept our independence, therefore,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6677"></td>
        <td id="LC6677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and had our weapons ready for any emergency, while preserving the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6678"></td>
        <td id="LC6678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friendly relations.  We also continually visited their caves, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6679"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6680"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6681"></td>
        <td id="LC6681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hollowed out of some soft rock which lay between the volcanic basalt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6682"></td>
        <td id="LC6682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forming the ruddy cliffs above them, and the hard granite which formed</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6684"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6685"></td>
        <td id="LC6685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The openings were about eighty feet above the ground, and were led up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6686"></td>
        <td id="LC6686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to by long stone stairs, so narrow and steep that no large animal could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6687"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6690"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6692"></td>
        <td id="LC6692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the walls of these caves ample evidence of the strange fauna--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6695"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6696"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6698"></td>
        <td id="LC6698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that man, even with his primitive weapons, had established his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6699"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6700"></td>
        <td id="LC6700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so, and that he was still there upon tolerance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6701"></td>
        <td id="LC6701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6702"></td>
        <td id="LC6702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was on the third day after our forming our camp near the Indian</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6703"></td>
        <td id="LC6703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">caves that the tragedy occurred.  Challenger and Summerlee had gone off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6704"></td>
        <td id="LC6704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together that day to the lake where some of the natives, under their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6705"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6706"></td>
        <td id="LC6706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lord John and I had remained in our camp, while a number of the Indians</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6707"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6708"></td>
        <td id="LC6708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engaged in different ways.  Suddenly there was a shrill cry of alarm,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6709"></td>
        <td id="LC6709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the word &quot;Stoa&quot; resounding from a hundred tongues.  From every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6710"></td>
        <td id="LC6710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side men, women, and children were rushing wildly for shelter, swarming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6711"></td>
        <td id="LC6711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up the staircases and into the caves in a mad stampede.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6712"></td>
        <td id="LC6712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6713"></td>
        <td id="LC6713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Looking up, we could see them waving their arms from the rocks above</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6714"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6715"></td>
        <td id="LC6715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our magazine rifles and ran out to see what the danger could be.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6716"></td>
        <td id="LC6716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suddenly from the near belt of trees there broke forth a group of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6717"></td>
        <td id="LC6717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twelve or fifteen Indians, running for their lives, and at their very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6718"></td>
        <td id="LC6718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heels two of those frightful monsters which had disturbed our camp and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6719"></td>
        <td id="LC6719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pursued me upon my solitary journey.  In shape they were like horrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6720"></td>
        <td id="LC6720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">toads, and moved in a succession of springs, but in size they were of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6721"></td>
        <td id="LC6721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an incredible bulk, larger than the largest elephant.  We had never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6722"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC6723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">save when disturbed in their lairs, as these had been.  We now stood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6724"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6725"></td>
        <td id="LC6725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curious fish-like iridescence, and the sunlight struck them with an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6726"></td>
        <td id="LC6726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever-varying rainbow bloom as they moved.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6727"></td>
        <td id="LC6727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6728"></td>
        <td id="LC6728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had little time to watch them, however, for in an instant they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6729"></td>
        <td id="LC6729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overtaken the fugitives and were making a dire slaughter among them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6730"></td>
        <td id="LC6730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their method was to fall forward with their full weight upon each in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6731"></td>
        <td id="LC6731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn, leaving him crushed and mangled, to bound on after the others.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6732"></td>
        <td id="LC6732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wretched Indians screamed with terror, but were helpless, run as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6733"></td>
        <td id="LC6733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would, before the relentless purpose and horrible activity of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6734"></td>
        <td id="LC6734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these monstrous creatures.  One after another they went down, and there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6735"></td>
        <td id="LC6735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were not half-a-dozen surviving by the time my companion and I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6736"></td>
        <td id="LC6736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come to their help.  But our aid was of little avail and only involved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6737"></td>
        <td id="LC6737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us in the same peril.  At the range of a couple of hundred yards we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6738"></td>
        <td id="LC6738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emptied our magazines, firing bullet after bullet into the beasts, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6739"></td>
        <td id="LC6739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with no more effect than if we were pelting them with pellets of paper.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6740"></td>
        <td id="LC6740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their slow reptilian natures cared nothing for wounds, and the springs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6741"></td>
        <td id="LC6741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their lives, with no special brain center but scattered throughout</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6742"></td>
        <td id="LC6742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their spinal cords, could not be tapped by any modern weapons.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6743"></td>
        <td id="LC6743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most that we could do was to check their progress by distracting their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6744"></td>
        <td id="LC6744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attention with the flash and roar of our guns, and so to give both the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6745"></td>
        <td id="LC6745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">natives and ourselves time to reach the steps which led to safety.  But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6746"></td>
        <td id="LC6746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where the conical explosive bullets of the twentieth century were of no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6747"></td>
        <td id="LC6747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">avail, the poisoned arrows of the natives, dipped in the juice of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6748"></td>
        <td id="LC6748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strophanthus and steeped afterwards in decayed carrion, could succeed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6749"></td>
        <td id="LC6749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such arrows were of little avail to the hunter who attacked the beast,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6750"></td>
        <td id="LC6750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because their action in that torpid circulation was slow, and before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6751"></td>
        <td id="LC6751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its powers failed it could certainly overtake and slay its assailant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6752"></td>
        <td id="LC6752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But now, as the two monsters hounded us to the very foot of the stairs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6753"></td>
        <td id="LC6753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a drift of darts came whistling from every chink in the cliff above</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6754"></td>
        <td id="LC6754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them.  In a minute they were feathered with them, and yet with no sign</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6755"></td>
        <td id="LC6755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of pain they clawed and slobbered with impotent rage at the steps which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6756"></td>
        <td id="LC6756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would lead them to their victims, mounting clumsily up for a few yards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6757"></td>
        <td id="LC6757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then sliding down again to the ground.  But at last the poison</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6758"></td>
        <td id="LC6758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worked.  One of them gave a deep rumbling groan and dropped his huge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6759"></td>
        <td id="LC6759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">squat head on to the earth.  The other bounded round in an eccentric</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6760"></td>
        <td id="LC6760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circle with shrill, wailing cries, and then lying down writhed in agony</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6761"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6762"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6763"></td>

      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L6785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6785"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6796"></td>

        <td id="L6797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6797"></td>

        <td id="L6799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6799"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6802"></td>

        <td id="L6803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6803"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L6826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6826"></td>

        <td id="L6827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6827"></td>

        <td id="L6828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6828"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6829"></td>
        <td id="LC6829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My answer is, that there was not one of us who was not working for this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6830"></td>
        <td id="LC6830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end, but that our work had been in vain.  One fact we had very speedily</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
