      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7109"></td>
        <td id="LC7109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There are no Indians in any of the caves above our heads,&quot; said I.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7110"></td>
        <td id="LC7110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;They are all used as barns and store-houses.  Why should we not go up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7111"></td>
        <td id="LC7111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now at once and spy out the land?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7112"></td>
        <td id="LC7112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7113"></td>
        <td id="LC7113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is a dry bituminous wood upon the plateau--a species of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7114"></td>
        <td id="LC7114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">araucaria, according to our botanist--which is always used by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7115"></td>
        <td id="LC7115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Indians for torches.  Each of us picked up a faggot of this, and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7116"></td>
        <td id="LC7116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made our way up weed-covered steps to the particular cave which was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7117"></td>
        <td id="LC7117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marked in the drawing.  It was, as I had said, empty, save for a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7118"></td>
        <td id="LC7118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">number of enormous bats, which flapped round our heads as we advanced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7119"></td>
        <td id="LC7119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into it.  As we had no desire to draw the attention of the Indians to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7120"></td>
        <td id="LC7120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our proceedings, we stumbled along in the dark until we had gone round</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7121"></td>
        <td id="LC7121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several curves and penetrated a considerable distance into the cavern.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7122"></td>
        <td id="LC7122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, at last, we lit our torches.  It was a beautiful dry tunnel with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7123"></td>
        <td id="LC7123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smooth gray walls covered with native symbols, a curved roof which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7124"></td>
        <td id="LC7124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arched over our heads, and white glistening sand beneath our feet.  We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7125"></td>
        <td id="LC7125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hurried eagerly along it until, with a deep groan of bitter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7126"></td>
        <td id="LC7126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disappointment, we were brought to a halt.  A sheer wall of rock had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7127"></td>
        <td id="LC7127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appeared before us, with no chink through which a mouse could have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7128"></td>
        <td id="LC7128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slipped.  There was no escape for us there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7129"></td>
        <td id="LC7129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7130"></td>
        <td id="LC7130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We stood with bitter hearts staring at this unexpected obstacle.  It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7131"></td>
        <td id="LC7131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was not the result of any convulsion, as in the case of the ascending</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7132"></td>
        <td id="LC7132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tunnel.  The end wall was exactly like the side ones.  It was, and had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7133"></td>
        <td id="LC7133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always been, a cul-de-sac.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7134"></td>
        <td id="LC7134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7135"></td>
        <td id="LC7135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Never mind, my friends,&quot; said the indomitable Challenger.  &quot;You have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7136"></td>
        <td id="LC7136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still my firm promise of a balloon.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7137"></td>
        <td id="LC7137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7138"></td>
        <td id="LC7138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Summerlee groaned.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7139"></td>
        <td id="LC7139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7140"></td>
        <td id="LC7140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Can we be in the wrong cave?&quot; I suggested.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7141"></td>
        <td id="LC7141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7142"></td>
        <td id="LC7142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No use, young fellah,&quot; said Lord John, with his finger on the chart.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7143"></td>
        <td id="LC7143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Seventeen from the right and second from the left.  This is the cave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7144"></td>
        <td id="LC7144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sure enough.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7145"></td>
        <td id="LC7145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7146"></td>
        <td id="LC7146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I looked at the mark to which his finger pointed, and I gave a sudden</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7147"></td>
        <td id="LC7147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cry of joy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7148"></td>
        <td id="LC7148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7149"></td>
        <td id="LC7149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I believe I have it!  Follow me!  Follow me!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7150"></td>
        <td id="LC7150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7151"></td>
        <td id="LC7151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I hurried back along the way we had come, my torch in my hand.  &quot;Here,&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7152"></td>
        <td id="LC7152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said I, pointing to some matches upon the ground, &quot;is where we lit up.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7153"></td>
        <td id="LC7153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7154"></td>
        <td id="LC7154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Exactly.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7155"></td>
        <td id="LC7155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7156"></td>
        <td id="LC7156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, it is marked as a forked cave, and in the darkness we passed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7157"></td>
        <td id="LC7157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fork before the torches were lit.  On the right side as we go out we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7158"></td>
        <td id="LC7158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should find the longer arm.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7159"></td>
        <td id="LC7159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7160"></td>
        <td id="LC7160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was as I had said.  We had not gone thirty yards before a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7161"></td>
        <td id="LC7161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">black opening loomed in the wall.  We turned into it to find that we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7162"></td>
        <td id="LC7162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were in a much larger passage than before.  Along it we hurried in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7163"></td>
        <td id="LC7163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breathless impatience for many hundreds of yards.  Then, suddenly, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7164"></td>
        <td id="LC7164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the black darkness of the arch in front of us we saw a gleam of dark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7165"></td>
        <td id="LC7165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">red light.  We stared in amazement.  A sheet of steady flame seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7166"></td>
        <td id="LC7166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cross the passage and to bar our way.  We hastened towards it.  No</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7167"></td>
        <td id="LC7167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sound, no heat, no movement came from it, but still the great luminous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7168"></td>
        <td id="LC7168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curtain glowed before us, silvering all the cave and turning the sand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7169"></td>
        <td id="LC7169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to powdered jewels, until as we drew closer it discovered a circular</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7170"></td>
        <td id="LC7170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">edge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7171"></td>
        <td id="LC7171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7172"></td>
        <td id="LC7172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The moon, by George!&quot; cried Lord John.  &quot;We are through, boys!  We are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7173"></td>
        <td id="LC7173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7174"></td>
        <td id="LC7174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7175"></td>
        <td id="LC7175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was indeed the full moon which shone straight down the aperture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7176"></td>
        <td id="LC7176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which opened upon the cliffs.  It was a small rift, not larger than a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7177"></td>
        <td id="LC7177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window, but it was enough for all our purposes.  As we craned our necks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7178"></td>
        <td id="LC7178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through it we could see that the descent was not a very difficult one,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7179"></td>
        <td id="LC7179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that the level ground was no very great way below us.  It was no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7180"></td>
        <td id="LC7180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonder that from below we had not observed the place, as the cliffs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7181"></td>
        <td id="LC7181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curved overhead and an ascent at the spot would have seemed so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7182"></td>
        <td id="LC7182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impossible as to discourage close inspection.  We satisfied ourselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7183"></td>
        <td id="LC7183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that with the help of our rope we could find our way down, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7184"></td>
        <td id="LC7184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">returned, rejoicing, to our camp to make our preparations for the next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7185"></td>
        <td id="LC7185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evening.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7186"></td>
        <td id="LC7186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7187"></td>
        <td id="LC7187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What we did we had to do quickly and secretly, since even at this last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7188"></td>
        <td id="LC7188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour the Indians might hold us back.  Our stores we would leave behind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7189"></td>
        <td id="LC7189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us, save only our guns and cartridges.  But Challenger had some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7190"></td>
        <td id="LC7190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unwieldy stuff which he ardently desired to take with him, and one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7191"></td>
        <td id="LC7191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular package, of which I may not speak, which gave us more labor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7192"></td>
        <td id="LC7192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than any.  Slowly the day passed, but when the darkness fell we were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7193"></td>
        <td id="LC7193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ready for our departure.  With much labor we got our things up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7194"></td>
        <td id="LC7194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steps, and then, looking back, took one last long survey of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7195"></td>
        <td id="LC7195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strange land, soon I fear to be vulgarized, the prey of hunter and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7196"></td>
        <td id="LC7196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prospector, but to each of us a dreamland of glamour and romance, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7197"></td>
        <td id="LC7197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">land where we had dared much, suffered much, and learned much--OUR</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7198"></td>
        <td id="LC7198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">land, as we shall ever fondly call it.  Along upon our left the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7199"></td>
        <td id="LC7199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neighboring caves each threw out its ruddy cheery firelight into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7200"></td>
        <td id="LC7200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloom.  From the slope below us rose the voices of the Indians as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7201"></td>
        <td id="LC7201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughed and sang.  Beyond was the long sweep of the woods, and in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7202"></td>
        <td id="LC7202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">center, shimmering vaguely through the gloom, was the great lake, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7203"></td>
        <td id="LC7203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother of strange monsters.  Even as we looked a high whickering cry,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7204"></td>
        <td id="LC7204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the call of some weird animal, rang clear out of the darkness.  It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7205"></td>
        <td id="LC7205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the very voice of Maple White Land bidding us good-bye.  We turned and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7206"></td>
        <td id="LC7206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plunged into the cave which led to home.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7207"></td>
        <td id="LC7207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7208"></td>
        <td id="LC7208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two hours later, we, our packages, and all we owned, were at the foot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7209"></td>
        <td id="LC7209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the cliff.  Save for Challenger&#39;s luggage we had never a difficulty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7210"></td>
        <td id="LC7210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Leaving it all where we descended, we started at once for Zambo&#39;s camp.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7211"></td>
        <td id="LC7211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the early morning we approached it, but only to find, to our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7212"></td>
        <td id="LC7212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amazement, not one fire but a dozen upon the plain.  The rescue party</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7213"></td>
        <td id="LC7213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had arrived.  There were twenty Indians from the river, with stakes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7214"></td>
        <td id="LC7214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ropes, and all that could be useful for bridging the chasm.  At least</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7215"></td>
        <td id="LC7215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we shall have no difficulty now in carrying our packages, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7216"></td>
        <td id="LC7216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-morrow we begin to make our way back to the Amazon.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7217"></td>
        <td id="LC7217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7218"></td>
        <td id="LC7218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so, in humble and thankful mood, I close this account.  Our eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7219"></td>
        <td id="LC7219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have seen great wonders and our souls are chastened by what we have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7220"></td>
        <td id="LC7220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endured.  Each is in his own way a better and deeper man.  It may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7221"></td>
        <td id="LC7221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that when we reach Para we shall stop to refit.  If we do, this letter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7222"></td>
        <td id="LC7222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be a mail ahead.  If not, it will reach London on the very day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7223"></td>
        <td id="LC7223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I do.  In either case, my dear Mr. McArdle, I hope very soon to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7224"></td>
        <td id="LC7224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shake you by the hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7225"></td>
        <td id="LC7225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7226"></td>
        <td id="LC7226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7227"></td>
        <td id="LC7227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7228"></td>
        <td id="LC7228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7229"></td>
        <td id="LC7229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should wish to place upon record here our gratitude to all our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7230"></td>
        <td id="LC7230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends upon the Amazon for the very great kindness and hospitality</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7231"></td>
        <td id="LC7231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was shown to us upon our return journey.  Very particularly would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7232"></td>
        <td id="LC7232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I thank Senhor Penalosa and other officials of the Brazilian Government</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7233"></td>
        <td id="LC7233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the special arrangements by which we were helped upon our way, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7234"></td>
        <td id="LC7234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Senhor Pereira of Para, to whose forethought we owe the complete outfit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7235"></td>
        <td id="LC7235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for a decent appearance in the civilized world which we found ready for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7236"></td>
        <td id="LC7236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us at that town.  It seemed a poor return for all the courtesy which we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7237"></td>
        <td id="LC7237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">encountered that we should deceive our hosts and benefactors, but under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7238"></td>
        <td id="LC7238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the circumstances we had really no alternative, and I hereby tell them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7239"></td>
        <td id="LC7239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they will only waste their time and their money if they attempt to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7240"></td>
        <td id="LC7240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follow upon our traces.  Even the names have been altered in our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7241"></td>
        <td id="LC7241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accounts, and I am very sure that no one, from the most careful study</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7242"></td>
        <td id="LC7242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them, could come within a thousand miles of our unknown land.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7243"></td>
        <td id="LC7243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7244"></td>
        <td id="LC7244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The excitement which had been caused through those parts of South</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7245"></td>
        <td id="LC7245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">America which we had to traverse was imagined by us to be purely local,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7246"></td>
        <td id="LC7246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I can assure our friends in England that we had no notion of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7247"></td>
        <td id="LC7247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uproar which the mere rumor of our experiences had caused through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7248"></td>
        <td id="LC7248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Europe.  It was not until the Ivernia was within five hundred miles of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7249"></td>
        <td id="LC7249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Southampton that the wireless messages from paper after paper and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7250"></td>
        <td id="LC7250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agency after agency, offering huge prices for a short return message as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7251"></td>
        <td id="LC7251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to our actual results, showed us how strained was the attention not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7252"></td>
        <td id="LC7252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only of the scientific world but of the general public.  It was agreed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7253"></td>
        <td id="LC7253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among us, however, that no definite statement should be given to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7254"></td>
        <td id="LC7254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Press until we had met the members of the Zoological Institute, since</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7255"></td>
        <td id="LC7255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as delegates it was our clear duty to give our first report to the body</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7256"></td>
        <td id="LC7256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from which we had received our commission of investigation.  Thus,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7257"></td>
        <td id="LC7257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although we found Southampton full of Pressmen, we absolutely refused</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7258"></td>
        <td id="LC7258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to give any information, which had the natural effect of focussing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7259"></td>
        <td id="LC7259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">public attention upon the meeting which was advertised for the evening</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7260"></td>
        <td id="LC7260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of November 7th.  For this gathering, the Zoological Hall which had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7261"></td>
        <td id="LC7261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been the scene of the inception of our task was found to be far too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7262"></td>
        <td id="LC7262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">small, and it was only in the Queen&#39;s Hall in Regent Street that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7263"></td>
        <td id="LC7263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accommodation could be found.  It is now common knowledge the promoters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7264"></td>
        <td id="LC7264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might have ventured upon the Albert Hall and still found their space</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7265"></td>
        <td id="LC7265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too scanty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7266"></td>
        <td id="LC7266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7267"></td>
        <td id="LC7267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was for the second evening after our arrival that the great meeting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7268"></td>
        <td id="LC7268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been fixed.  For the first, we had each, no doubt, our own pressing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7269"></td>
        <td id="LC7269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">personal affairs to absorb us.  Of mine I cannot yet speak.  It may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7270"></td>
        <td id="LC7270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that as it stands further from me I may think of it, and even speak of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7271"></td>
        <td id="LC7271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, with less emotion.  I have shown the reader in the beginning of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7272"></td>
        <td id="LC7272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this narrative where lay the springs of my action.  It is but right,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7273"></td>
        <td id="LC7273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perhaps, that I should carry on the tale and show also the results.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7274"></td>
        <td id="LC7274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And yet the day may come when I would not have it otherwise.  At least</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7275"></td>
        <td id="LC7275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have been driven forth to take part in a wondrous adventure, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7276"></td>
        <td id="LC7276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot but be thankful to the force that drove me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7277"></td>
        <td id="LC7277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7278"></td>
        <td id="LC7278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now I turn to the last supreme eventful moment of our adventure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7279"></td>
        <td id="LC7279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As I was racking my brain as to how I should best describe it, my eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7280"></td>
        <td id="LC7280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fell upon the issue of my own Journal for the morning of the 8th of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7281"></td>
        <td id="LC7281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">November with the full and excellent account of my friend and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7282"></td>
        <td id="LC7282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fellow-reporter Macdona.  What can I do better than transcribe his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7283"></td>
        <td id="LC7283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">narrative--head-lines and all?  I admit that the paper was exuberant in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7284"></td>
        <td id="LC7284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the matter, out of compliment to its own enterprise in sending a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7285"></td>
        <td id="LC7285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">correspondent, but the other great dailies were hardly less full in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7286"></td>
        <td id="LC7286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their account.  Thus, then, friend Mac in his report:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7287"></td>
        <td id="LC7287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7288"></td>
        <td id="LC7288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7289"></td>
        <td id="LC7289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                           THE NEW WORLD</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7290"></td>
        <td id="LC7290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                 GREAT MEETING AT THE QUEEN&#39;S HALL</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7291"></td>
        <td id="LC7291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                          SCENES OF UPROAR</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7292"></td>
        <td id="LC7292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                       EXTRAORDINARY INCIDENT</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7293"></td>
        <td id="LC7293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                            WHAT WAS IT?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7294"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7380"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7381"></td>
        <td id="LC7381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Having conducted his audience in fancy to the summit, and marooned</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7382"></td>
        <td id="LC7382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them there by reason of the fall of their bridge, the Professor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7383"></td>
        <td id="LC7383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceeded to describe both the horrors and the attractions of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7384"></td>
        <td id="LC7384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remarkable land.  Of personal adventures he said little, but laid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7385"></td>
